snippet: In which Grandma takes one for the team, in a puzzle by Adam G. Perl.
abstract: In which Grandma takes one for the team, in a puzzle by Adam G. Perl.
lead_paragraph: MONDAY’S PUZZLE – Who’s afraid of the Monday puzzle? There’s never a woodsman around when you need one. Today, we need to rescue LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD from the BIG BAD WOLF’S mouth.
